segment.source: How to Reset a TPM Lockout
segment.target: How to Reset a TPM Lockout

segment.source: How to Reset a TPM Lockout
segment.target: How to Reset a TPM Lockout

segment.source: How to Reset a TPM Lockout
segment.target: How to Reset a TPM Lockout

segment.source: The Encrypted Drive Recovery feature of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) encompasses both the capture and storage of data and the availability for tools that are required to manage the Trusted Platform Module (TPM).
segment.target: The Encrypted Drive Recovery feature of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) encompasses both the capture and storage of data and the availability for tools that are required to manage the Trusted Platform Module (TPM).

segment.source: This topic covers how to access the centralized Key Recovery data system in the bitadmmontlanextref administration website.
segment.target: This topic covers how to access the centralized Key Recovery data system in the bitadmmontlanextref administration website.

segment.source: The Key Recovery data system can provide a TPM owner password file when the computer identity and the associated user identifier are supplied.
segment.target: The Key Recovery data system can provide a TPM owner password file when the computer identity and the associated user identifier are supplied.

segment.source: A TPM lockout can occur if a user enters an incorrect PIN too many times.
segment.target: A TPM lockout can occur if a user enters an incorrect PIN too many times.

segment.source: The number of times that a user can enter an incorrect PIN before the TPM lockout is based on the computer manufacturer's specification.
segment.target: The number of times that a user can enter an incorrect PIN before the TPM lockout is based on the computer manufacturer's specification.

segment.source: To reset a TPM lockout
segment.target: To reset a TPM lockout

segment.source: Open the MBAM administration website.
segment.target: Open the MBAM administration website.

segment.source: In the navigation pane, select Manage TPM.
segment.target: In the navigation pane, select Manage TPM.

segment.source: This opens the Manage TPM page.
segment.target: This opens the Manage TPM page.

segment.source: Enter the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) for the computer and the computer name.
segment.target: Enter the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) for the computer and the computer name.

segment.source: Enter the user’s Windows Logon domain and the user’s user name.
segment.target: Enter the user’s Windows Logon domain and the user’s user name.

segment.source: Select one of the predefined options in the Reason for requesting TPM owner password file drop-down menu.
segment.target: Select one of the predefined options in the Reason for requesting TPM owner password file drop-down menu.

segment.source: Click Submit.
segment.target: Click Submit.

segment.source: MBAM will return one of the following:
segment.target: MBAM will return one of the following:

segment.source: An error message if no matching TPM owner password file is found
segment.target: An error message if no matching TPM owner password file is found

segment.source: The TPM owner password file for the submitted computer
segment.target: The TPM owner password file for the submitted computer

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you are an Advanced Helpdesk User, the user domain and user ID fields are not required.
segment.target: If you are an Advanced Helpdesk User, the user domain and user ID fields are not required.

segment.source: Upon retrieval, the owner password is displayed.
segment.target: Upon retrieval, the owner password is displayed.

segment.source: To save this password to a .tpm file, click the Save button.
segment.target: To save this password to a .tpm file, click the Save button.

segment.source: The user will run the TPM management console and select the Reset TPM lockout option and provide the TPM owner password file to reset the TPM lockout.
segment.target: The user will run the TPM management console and select the Reset TPM lockout option and provide the TPM owner password file to reset the TPM lockout.
